sn48.56:1.1: “Mendicants, when a mendicant is grounded in one thing the five faculties become developed, well developed.
sn48.56:1.5: It’s when a mendicant looks after their mind when it comes to defilements and things that stimulate defilements.
sn48.56:1.6: As they do so the faculties of faith,
sn48.56:1.11: That’s how when a mendicant is grounded in one thing the five faculties become developed, well developed.”
